ValidationRule.description: GTMS-26117: Created as part of Partners H1 project to throw error if Source Payout Fee field is empty when Source Payout Model is selected as Flat Fee
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(Sourced_Payout_Model__c,'Flat Rate'), OR( ISNULL(Sourced_Payout_Fee__c), Sourced_Payout_Fee__c <= 0 )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You’ve selected ‘Flat Rate’ for the Sourced Payout Model, but have not included the desired fee amount. Please update the 'Sourced Payout Fee” to a number greater than 0 to save this program.
